Fukushima-shi, Fukushima-ken 960–8601 | website = City of Fukushima | footnotes = }} Fukushima is a city in northern Japan. It is the capital of Fukushima Prefecture. The city of Iino was merged into the city of Fukushima on 1 July 2008. ==Geography== The Abukuma River flows through this city. == References == == Other websites == *Fukushima's Official city website (Japanese) Category:Cities in Fukushima Prefecture
